bannerDes1: The fastest way to learn vocabulary
valueConvenientDes: Never miss new words you see everyday!
valueCloudStorageDes: Collect and save vocabulary from any where, any time
valueFlashCardDes: Testing your knowledge and being master with smart Flashcard mode
descriptionDes: Wordsmine is the first second language learning app that helps you collect vocabulary you see in daily Internet-surfing activities, and learn them faster by giving you scientific approaches and contextualized examples taken from reliable sources.
topicTitle: Give it a try! Let's go!
featureTitle: What you can do with Wordsmine?
featureSaveFromSelectionDes: You can store any words from any pages. All the vocabularies are saved for later reviewing just in one place
featureSaveFromClipboardDes: You are in hurry? Don't worry, we also allow to you to save words on the go while surfing the net
featureCollectWordsFromMobileDes: Catch some new words when browsing web in mobile, we can capture them too
featureFlashcardToLearnTitle: Use flashcard mode to memorize your learning
featureFlashcardToLearnDes: No more forgetting every new word you see everyday, we help put them to stay engraved in your memory
featureLookupDefinitionTitle: Lookup for definition from reliable sources
featureLookupDefinitionDes: Learn to use your words wisely in proper context, word definition is provided from different reputable sources
featureCustomDefinitionTitle: Customize your definition as you want
featureCustomDefinitionDes: Personalize the word definition to your desire so it can be more memorable only for you
testimonialContent: WordsMine! has helped me to understand just how fun and important and fun studying can be! This school year, in IELTS class I put my terms on WordsMine! and I already feel better about my upcoming test.
ctaTitle: Ready to start getting better grades?
ctaRule: I agree to the terms of service and privacy policy.
